metadata.name: Young Amazon in a Landscape
metadata.description:
“Young Amazon in a Landscape” is a folkfuturism portrait of an amazon and her kingdom.

In june 2021 I was commissioned by the Thyssen-Bornemisza National Museum to collaborate and create the S1N3 version of a classical painting of its collection.

The original painting is “Young Knight in a Landscape” by Vittore Carpaccio.


3077x4500
